"Team Tasks":
"Team Tasks are Side Tasks that can only be accepted if you belong to a Team. They can be accepted from the Team Support Staff Member, Tim.

Team Tasks are updated every Wed. 3:00

The number of Team Tasks you can accept at once will be increased by 2 if your Team has 10 or more Members, and by a further 2 if you have 20 or more Members."

"Completing Team Tasks will reward you with Team Badges.

You can trade Team Badges for Battle Triggers, special Accessories and so on by talking to Tim and selecting \"Exchange for Team Badges\"."
"Tim appears at the ARKS Bases in each Region, such as Central City."
